title: How to change Draven's spinng axe landing indicator?
body:
I don't play too much ADC, but I'm starting to take an interest in Draven. However, I've noticed that when others play Draven, they get a distinct pattern for the landing zone of their spinning axe. For me, it's just a faint glowing outline of a circle. My version is a lot less clear, so is there a way I can change this? This question may sound really dumb to some people, but again, I am new to Draven.

EDIT: I put a picture of the problem in the comments, but to be sure nobody misses it -
https://imgur.com/rss979i

replies.body: I think this may be a practice tool issue as well.  Sometimes things break on Practice tool or not show properly.  Does the indicator appear in custom or other game modes?  You may want to post this on the[ bug report](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards so our QA can look into it.

>
> I think this may be a practice tool issue as well.  Sometimes things break on Practice tool or not show properly.  Does the indicator appear in custom or other game modes?  You may want to post this on the[ bug report](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards so our QA can look into it.

I've tried Draven in bot games, still the same issue. I assume this problem will persist for the other game modes. I guess I will post this to bug reports. The reason I didn't do that in the first place is because others don't seem to have this problem, so I thought it was something I could fix on my own.

Just to be safe, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch can fix any potentially bad files.  Hoping that may do the trick for you!
